house_listing.house_description: 5 bedrooms, 3 baths, 2166 sq ft of living area, near odu, corner lot, recently sided with vinyl, master bedroom has extra large bath and closet area, natural gas furnace w/ hot water radiators, duplex home converted to a single family home, very active civic league in area.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
